Reviews.Title: Great kit, great price
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sean A. Brown "Snowbird"
Reviews.Content: Exactly what we were needing, at a great price!  Batteries, charger and tripod are just what we need for our camera.

Reviews.Title: Battery Kit worked extremely well.
Reviews.Author: memesgrdn
Reviews.Content: Good kit, worked well for my Sony camera.  Batteries stay charged and the extra's in it were a nice bonus.  I had lost my charger and this one took it's place.  Came promptly and in brand new condition. Good price.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB 50 in 1 SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
